title: Google\Cloud\NetworkConnectivity\V1\LinkedRouterApplianceInstances
name: LinkedRouterApplianceInstances
description:
A collection of router appliance instances. If you have multiple router appliance instances connected to the same site, they should all be attached to the same spoke.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.networkconnectivity.v1.LinkedRouterApplianceInstances

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.site_to_site_data_transfer
params.description: A value that controls whether site-to-site data transfer is enabled for these resources. This field is set to false by default, but you must set it to true. Note that data transfer is available only in supported locations.

methods.name: getInstances
methods.description:
The list of router appliance instances.
